msDesc.note: Incomplet du début et de la fin.
Incomplet du début et de la fin.
Incomplet du début et de la fin.
Incomplet du début et de la fin.
Entièrement restauré. Chaque folio semble monté sur une feuille blanche. Très mauvais état en général.
Trois doubles feuillets d'un même cahier (les 2e, 4e et 6e d'un senion)

Longobardi, Monica. “Censimento Dei Codici Frammentari Scritti in Antico Francese e Provenzale Ora Conservati Nell’Archivio Di Stato Di Bologna. Bilancio Definitivo.” In La Cultura Dell’Italia Padana e La Presenza Francese Nei Secoli XIII-XV, 17–38. Alessandria: Edizioni dell’Orso, 2001.

Longobardi, Monica. “Censimento Dei Codici Frammentari Scritti in Antico Francese e Provenzale Ora Conservati Nell’Archivio Di Stato Di Bologna. Bilancio Definitivo.” In La Cultura Dell’Italia Padana e La Presenza Francese Nei Secoli XIII-XV, 17–38. Alessandria: Edizioni dell’Orso, 2001.

Bayot, Alphonse. “Fragments de Manuscrits Trouvés Aux Archives Du Royaume.” Revue Des Bibliothèques et Archives de Belgique 4 (1906): 281–98; 411–49, https://archive.org/details/RevueBiblArchBel4/page/n327 ; olim Bruxelles, Archives générales du Royaume, 1411 fragm. I for at least one of them

catDesc.name: fragmentary
catDesc.gloss: Surviving in only fragments. No complete witnesses survive.

catDesc.name: lost
catDesc.gloss: No witnesses of this text survive. It is a completely lost tradition.

catDesc.name: surviving
catDesc.gloss: Surviving in at least one (more or less) complete manuscript

catDesc.name: unknown
catDesc.gloss: The information is not ready to be input.

catDesc.name: Arthurian romance
catDesc.gloss: Arthurian romance grew out of chronicles purporting to record the history of King Arthur, his knights, and their martial or amatory adventures.

catDesc.name: Arthurroman
catDesc.gloss: 'Arthurroman is een verzamelnaam voor ridderromans ontstaan in de tweede helft van de twaalfde eeuw aan Noord-Franse adellijke hoven. Centraal, zij het op de achtergrond, staat koning Arthur. De mode begon met vijf Arthurromans in de volkstaal (ca. 1160-1190) van Chrétien de Troyes.'

catDesc.name: Carolingian romance
catDesc.gloss: Middle English romance surrounding characters related to Charlemagne or people at his court.

catDesc.name: Karelepiek
catDesc.gloss: Story about Charlemagne and his family.

catDesc.name: Other
catDesc.gloss: Any text that does not fit in with the main genres of Arthurian and Charlemagnian literature.

catDesc.name: chanson de geste
catDesc.gloss: Long epic poem from the Middle Ages.

catDesc.name: chronique
catDesc.gloss: 'Chroniques' autodésignées, en prose, dérivées de chansons de geste et romans

catDesc.name: mise en prose
catDesc.gloss: mise en prose de chansons de geste ou romans en vers

catDesc.name: roman
chivalric romance
chivalric novel
catDesc.gloss: "Un roman de chevalerie est une œuvre romanesque, le plus souvent en prose, inspirée ou adaptée des romans courtois et des chansons de geste en vers des XIe et XIIIe siècles." (DBpedia)

catDesc.name: Artusroman
catDesc.gloss: Middle High German form of romance or epic based on the Matière de Bretagne

catDesc.name: riddarasögur
chivalric sagas
catDesc.gloss: The riddarasögur are Norse prose sagas of the romance genre. Starting in the thirteenth century with Norse translations of French chansons de geste and Latin romances and histories, the genre expanded in Iceland to indigenous creations in a similar style.

catDesc.name: riddarasögur translated
catDesc.gloss: Norse translations of French chansons de geste and Latin romances and histories,

catDesc.name: riddarasögur indigenous
catDesc.gloss: Icelandic indigenous creations in a style of riddarasögur
